item.title: Portfolio
item.description:
Daily Dash

🏃‍♀️ An offline platformer runner game.

Project Overview

Category Tech Stack Role
Platformer Runner Game C++ + raylib Solo Project

Project Description

This is a solo project I completed during university. The player character runs automatically, dodging enemies and jumping over obstacles to reach the finish line. The gameplay is fast-paced, designed for quick pick-up-and-play sessions and repeated challenges.

Highlights

  • Implemented multi-layered background auto-scrolling to enhance visual dynamism
  • Developed enemy AI logic including movement, collision detection, and trigger mechanisms
  • Designed and built a local leaderboard system to track player scores
  • Used plain text files for data persistence and retrieval

Retrospective

Given the five-week development timeline, I prioritized rapid prototyping to deliver core gameplay features. However, the lack of modular architecture made later feature expansion and maintenance more difficult, highlighting the importance of scalable design.

Next Steps

  • Introduce object pooling to optimize enemy spawning logic, improving performance and resource management efficiency

  • Refactor the project architecture for better modularity and maintainability

  • Add a new sliding animation for the player character to enrich movement dynamics

  • Implement level data loading from local files to support scalable stage design

(Estimated completion: December 2025)

动物世界

🐄 多种算法实现

项目信息

类型 技术栈 职责
算法实现 C++ + raylib 独立项目

项目简介

本项目是我在游戏设计专业二年级期间独立完成的作品，旨在模拟一个动态生态系统。草、羊、狼和乌鸦各自遵循不同的行为模式：草会生长并扩散；羊会寻找并吃草、逃避狼、繁殖或漫游；狼会追捕羊、繁殖或漫游；乌鸦则随机飞进飞出场景。通过这些行为的交互，草原生态逐渐形成一种动态平衡。

项目亮点

  • 使用有限状态机（FSM）管理动物行为逻辑，实现清晰的状态切换与响应机制
  • 应用 Boid 算法模拟乌鸦的群体飞行行为，增强自然感与动态表现
  • 构建了基础生态循环机制，支持草扩散、动物繁殖与资源消耗

复盘

下一步计划包括重构项目架构，实现模块化与可扩展性；同时加入图片与动画资源，提升视觉表现力与用户理解度，使项目更接近商业原型的标准。

下一步计划

重新调整项目架构，进行模块化重构，使代码更接近商业级水准。加入图片和动画来表示不同的动/植物以及其相应的行为。

（预计完成时间：2025年12月）

Hum to Heal

🎵 多人协作拍手音游，探索音乐与互动的治愈力量

项目信息

类型 技术栈 展出经历
Arcade 音游 Unity + C# 2023 Gotland Game Conference

项目简介

本项目是我在游戏设计专业一年级期间完成的作品。玩家站在机器四角，通过相邻两人的拍手击中音符块，形成节奏配合。该设计鼓励玩家之间的互动与节奏感，既适合好友一起玩，也能作为陌生人之间的破冰方式。展会现场反响热烈，吸引大量观众试玩。

职责

本项目由我与三名同学合作完成（分别负责游戏策划和美术设计与实现、arcade设备建造、项目管理），我独立承担全部编程与技术实现工作，包括音符判定、节奏同步、玩家输入逻辑等。同时，我设计并制作了玩家道具“手套”，将物理反馈与游戏机制结合，增强玩家沉浸感。

复盘

为了在10周内完成展出版本，我们在部分功能上做了妥协。例如，长音符的实现则以两根短音符替代，影响了节奏连贯性与玩家反馈。

下一步计划

下一步计划包括完善长音符的实现，以提升节奏表现力和玩家反馈体验；同时采用对象池优化音符生成逻辑，提升性能；重新调整架构，为后续关卡扩展做好准备。

（预计完成时间：2026.1）

当前探索领域

这些方向将持续推进，并在未来项目中逐步体现成果

游戏开发

  • 正在系统学习游戏架构设计与模块化原则，目标是重构现有项目以提升可维护性与扩展性
  • 探索并掌握常用设计模式，如状态机、观察者、组件系统等，用于优化游戏逻辑
  • 当前专注于 C++ 实现，后续计划系统学习主流游戏引擎（Unity、Unreal、Cocos、Godot），拓展跨平台开发能力

前端开发

  • 系统学习前端开发基础与进阶知识，用以优化本站的视觉表现与交互体验
  • 计划使用 Hugo 更复杂的主题，开发独立的 Portfolio + CV 网站，实现更强的内容组织与样式定制

item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

🥷 A self-taught, semi-wild programmer who came into tech a bit unconventionally.

⌨️ Started out in game development, but curious about many fields.

🎒 Spent years in school – only to realize most of what I know came from self-learning.

🍵 Used to love fitness and travel. These days, I’m all about the cozy indoor life.

🐱 Forever an animal lover.

📚 Forever a book lover.

About This Site

Content

Back when I was more of an artsy type, I enjoyed sharing bits of my personal life. These days, I focus on documenting my learning and work.

The Name: Nullshow

null stands for “empty”—a reflection of how I view life, and a reminder to always keep a beginner’s mindset.

show sounds like part of my Chinese name. The pronunciation of Nullshow is close to a childhood nickname, which brings back memories of carefree days.

Illustrations

All category illustrations come from Feng Zikai (1898–1975), a pioneer of Chinese comic art. His works are drawn from everyday life—simple, expressive, and full of childlike charm. He was from the same hometown as me. Using his art is both a tribute and a reminder to stay mindful of the beauty in daily life, beyond study and work.

Gratitude

This site was built with inspiration and silent help from many brilliant minds online. It’s made me truly appreciate the power of open-source and sharing. In this era of technological revolution, AI is making everything simpler and faster. I hope I’m not just swept along by the tide – but riding the wave with intention.

Thanks for joining me on this journey in such an exciting time.
